data.name: Cookie Clicker Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The official soundtrack to Cookie Clicker. If you’ve ever wanted to feel like suffocating the universe with cookie dough, but wanted it to sound chill, boy do we have the soundtrack for you! Created by music dude who also happened to have worked on Minecraft as well, C418. In his words ‘I ate a cookie once’.
data.about_the_game: The official soundtrack to Cookie Clicker. If you’ve ever wanted to feel like suffocating the universe with cookie dough, but wanted it to sound chill, boy do we have the soundtrack for you! Created by music dude who also happened to have worked on Minecraft as well, C418. In his words ‘I ate a cookie once’.
data.short_description: The official soundtrack to Cookie Clicker by C418.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 30 MB available space
